Cold Case: Son Ready to Forgive Mother's Killer

Everett had just turned in his first book on forgiveness when his 76-year-old mother was murdered. — WBIR-TV

Forgiveness: It's a Great Feeling

Sometimes forgiving the people who have hurt you is the best path to peace of mind and a way to move forward in your life — Beliefnet

Forgive and Be Well?

The act of pardoning can boost health of body and mind, studies show. But some say the forgiveness movement goes too far — Los Angeles Times
